kyc_identity_verification_manifest_actio.description: Actionable plan compiled from KYC Identity Verification Manifest

phases.name: PHASE 0: SETUP & PROTOCOL (READ FIRST)
phases.explanation: Establish strict execution protocol, gating, and constraints before any action.
phases.important_note: No direct writes to queue/state files by the agent. Use only read-only analyzers prior to any execution.

phases.name: PHASE 1: IDENTITY CAPTURE FOUNDATIONS
phases.explanation: Implement guided capture for web/mobile with automated glare/blur/orientation checks.
phases.important_note: IC1: >95% pass at 1000px width; orientation auto-correct; quality scores in [0..1].

phases.name: PHASE 2: EVIDENCE EXTRACTION PIPELINE
phases.explanation: Build a robust extraction layer: document classifier, OCR/MRZ/Barcode/NFC ingestion.
phases.important_note: EE1: Document classifier top-1 ≥0.9 confidence. EE2: ICAO 9303 MRZ checksums pass.

phases.name: PHASE 3: AUTHENTICITY & LIVENESS CHECKS
phases.explanation: Implement tamper/forgery detection, security-feature analysis, liveness checks.
phases.important_note: AU1: Security features with thresholds documented. AU2: Tamper detection AUC ≥0.9.

phases.name: PHASE 4: SANCTIONS & AML SCREENING
phases.explanation: Integrate vendor APIs for sanctions, PEP, adverse media, and watchlists.
phases.important_note: SA1: Vendor API integrated; hit explainability available to reviewers.

phases.name: PHASE 5: RISK SCORING & DECISIONING
phases.explanation: Combine signals into aggregate risk score for approve/review/deny decisions.
phases.important_note: RS1: Proxy/VPN detection enabled. RS3: Calibrated thresholds with ROC/AUC reported.

phases.name: PHASE 6: HUMAN REVIEW CONSOLE
phases.explanation: Deliver reviewer console with PII redaction and dual-control workflows.
phases.important_note: HR1: PII redaction toggle present; two-person approval for high risk.

phases.name: PHASE 7: COMPLIANCE, SECURITY, AND PRIVACY
phases.explanation: Ensure compliance with DPA/GDPR/CCPA and AML/KYC regulations.
phases.important_note: CP1: DPA/GDPR/CCPA alignment. CP2: AES-256 at rest; TLS1.2+.

phases.name: PHASE 8: OPERATIONS, OBSERVABILITY, AND MODEL LIFECYCLE
phases.explanation: Implement observability, SLOs, monitoring, and model management.
phases.important_note: OP1: SLOs defined; dashboards show risk distributions. OP2: Drift monitoring configured.
